title: Remodeled 1 Bed w/Walk-In Closet In Napa Valley. Just Waiting For You!
posting_body: ['2052 Wilkins Avenue, Napa, CA 94559', 'When you live at Napa Green Apartments, you know you have arrived!', 'You will enjoy the convenience of community living in a peaceful and tranquil environment surrounded by mature trees!', 'You are close to downtown Napa and to the Wine Country.', ' If you enjoy taking a drive surrounded by award winning vineyards, wineries or taking a trip to Yountville or St. Helena for a day of shopping and dining, it’s just a scenic drive away.', 'Come check us out!', 'Apartment Features:', 'White Cabinetry', 'Window Coverings', 'Patio', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Cable', 'Community Features:', 'Fitness Center', 'Clubhouse', 'Sports Court', 'Basketball Court', 'Two Swimming Pools', 'BBQ and Outdoor Dining Area', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', ' There is a $500 pet deposit per animal.', ' Pet rent is $50 per month.', ' There is a weight limit of 35lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Check out our virtual tour on our website at <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
